source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenic, aerial scenery shot of a city. The camera slowly pans from right to left, offering a sweeping view.

The video showcases the cityscape of Vancouver, British Columbia, on a clear day. In the background, the downtown skyline with its numerous skyscrapers is visible, set against the majestic, blue-hued North Shore Mountains. The foreground is dominated by a lush, green residential area with many trees and lower-rise apartment buildings.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
1. The camera movement is inaccurately described; instead of panning slowly from right to left, it actually moves downward.
2.The downtown skyline of numerous skyscrapers is in the midground, with the mountains in the background.
3. The description of the lush green residential area is misleading, as it extends from the foreground all the way to the midground, rather than being confined to the foreground.
4. 将caption合成一段
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:

2. The downtown skyline with its numerous skyscrapers is situated in the midground, while the mountains are in the background.
3. The description of the lush green residential area is misleading, as it extends from the foreground to the midground, rather than being limited to the foreground.

2. The downtown skyline with its numerous skyscrapers is situated in the midground, while the mountains are in the background.
3. The description of the lush green residential area is misleading, as it extends from the foreground to the midground, rather than being limited to the foreground.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a scenic, aerial shot of Vancouver, British Columbia, on a clear day. The camera moves downward, offering a sweeping view of the cityscape. In the foreground to midground, a lush, green residential area with many trees and lower-rise apartment buildings is visible. The midground features the downtown skyline with its numerous skyscrapers, set against the majestic, blue-hued North Shore Mountains in the background.

revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic, aerial shot of Vancouver, British Columbia, on a clear day. The camera moves downward, offering a sweeping view of the cityscape. The midground features the downtown skyline with its numerous skyscrapers, set against the majestic, blue-hued North Shore Mountains in the background.
